version_description:
Import Steps & Heart Rate from your Apple Watch
To activate this feature, go to « Profile » and click on the Apple Health button. Your workout views have also been improved to take heart rate into account.

Discover Steel HR
This app is now ready to support your next Activity, Heart Rate & Sleep tracker. Learn more on https://www.withings.com/products/steel-hr

You asked for it and we listened
- Your phone was heating and your battery was draining faster than usual. This Apple Health sync issue has been fixed.
- We fixed some connectivity issues and improved reliability and speed of Withings watches.
- Finally, a rare issue that would prevent Health Mate from starting correctly was fixed.

Love the app?
Please rate it 5* on the App Store.

Good news! Health Mate has been updated with new features and enhancements.
- Thermo data debuts in Health Mate: Owners of Withings Thermo - the coolest thermometer with the hottest technology - can now see their temperature data directly in their Health Mate timelines.
- We tracked and fixed some pesky bugs you may have found in Health Mate : like the Apple Watch app opening or some VoiceOver issue for accessibility

Do you like the app? Please rate it on the App Store! It would mean the world to us.

Do you like the app? Please rate it on the App Store! It would mean the world to us.

Good news! Health Mate has been updated :)
We tracked and fixed some pesky bugs you may have found in Health Mate in particular around activities. Many thanks for your help and sorry for any inconvenience.

Do you like the app? Please rate it on the App Store! It would mean the world to our engineers (and their moms).

Welcome to Nokia Health Mate
Withings is now Nokia. Discover how your trusted health companion app has improved.

Simplified navigation
Everything you need is a tap away.

Family matters
Enjoy easy access to health profiles of the people you care about.

Personal coaching
Achieve your health goals with expanded wellness programs.

Mission control
Manage all your settings in one place

Go Green
The new color scheme is your guide to better health.

This latest version solves some issues you may have faced with previous versions. We want you to know we are hard at work to resolve remaining issues as soon as possible. Here is an update on fixes:

Problems solved:
- Steel HR synchronization (sleep, heart rate & activity data)
- Weight measurement in the British Imperial units (st.lb.)

Coming soon:
- Data export via Apple Health
- Complete weight history (don’t worry, all your data is saved and will be integrated as soon as possible)
- Normality ranges for weight & body composition curves
- Body Mass Index (BMI) available in the dashboard
- Nutrition tracking with MyFitnessPal
- Environmental data from Smart Body Analyzer & Aura (Temperature, CO2)
- Aura settings in control center (e.g. alarm, start a nap)

Your feedback on the App Store has been invaluable in the quick identification of the issues in Health Mate, and we’d like to thank you for taking the time to let us know. If you are continuing to experience issues that aren’t listed above, please don’t hesitate to consult our Help Center for answers: nokia.ly/HealthSupport
--

Welcome to Nokia Health Mate
Withings is now Nokia. Discover how your trusted health companion app has improved.

Simplified navigation
Everything you need is a tap away.

Personal coaching
Achieve your health goals with expanded wellness programs.

Family matters
Enjoy easy access to health profiles of the people you care about.

Mission control
Manage all your settings in one place.

Go Green
The new color scheme is your guide to better health.

We’ve just released an update that solves many of the key issues experienced by our users. Here is what we’ve worked on:
- Ability to export all your data with Apple Health
- More weight history available on one screen and your complete history in the app
- Normal ranges for weight, body fat, muscle mass & BMI
- BMI and bone mass available in the Dashboard
- Smart Body Analyzer environmental data (CO2 & temperature) available in Dashboard
- Reminders available in Profile

Coming soon:
- Nutrition tracking via MyFitnessPal integration
- Runkeeper integration
- Height tracking
- Full functionality of Aura

Important: If you can’t see weight, blood pressure or heart rate data, please log out of the Health Mate app (Profile > settings top right > bottom of screen) and then log back in.

--

We’ve just released an update that corrects issues you may have been experiencing. Fixes include:
Nutrition tracking via MyFitnessPal integration
Runkeeper integration
Full Aura functionality

We hope this update allows you to fully enjoy Nokia Health Mate, and we apologize for any inconvenience. Your feedback on the App Store has been invaluable and we’d like to thank you for taking the time to help us identify the issues.

If you still having difficulties after installing this update, please contact us via our Help Center: nokia.ly/HealthSupport

We made some improvements. This update:
• Fixes an issue for users who encountered problems opening the app
• Enhances weight view navigation
• Enables you to delete secondary users

We’re always striving for a healthier app — and a healthier you. If you have questions, or experience any hiccups with this update, you can always reach out to us via our Help Center: nokia.ly/HealthSupport

We’re always striving for a healthier app — and a healthier you. If you have questions, or experience any hiccups with this update, you can always reach out to us via our Help Center: nokia.ly/HealthSupport

Thanks to all your feedback and suggestions, this update delivers a refreshed design of your Nokia Health Mate Timeline. It also brings many other improvements and bug fixes.

- Added labels to the bottom navigation
- Created an animated steps sync
- Enabled share via email for blood pressure
- Fixed weight sync issues that some experienced with our platform and partners
- Many other bug fixes

- Many other bug fixes

Thanks for using Health Mate! This version introduces weight graph improvements and stability enhancement. Various bugs, including Aura connectivity, have also been fixed.

We have always aimed to deliver innovative products that help people to take control of their own wellbeing. With our Body Cardio product, we brought Pulse Wave Velocity to a home scale for the first time. After routine review, we now believe that this feature may require a different level of regulatory approval. In light of this, we have decided to deactivate the Pulse Wave Velocity feature on January 24.
As a result, Pulse Wave Velocity readings will no longer appear on the scale screen nor will they be viewable in the Nokia Health Mate app. Your data will be retained and is downloadable.
We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience and we invite you to read our FAQ page where you’ll find out more, including how to retrieve your Pulse Wave Velocity history if you wish.

We have always aimed to deliver innovative products that help people to take control of their own wellbeing. With our Body Cardio product, we brought Pulse Wave Velocity to a home scale for the first time. After routine review, we now believe that this feature may require a different level of regulatory approval. In light of this, we have decided to deactivate the Pulse Wave Velocity feature on January 24.
As a result, Pulse Wave Velocity readings will no longer appear on the scale screen nor will they be viewable in the Nokia Health Mate app. Your data will be retained and is downloadable.
We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience and we invite you to read our FAQ page where you’ll find out more, including how to retrieve your Pulse Wave Velocity history if you wish.

Your favorite health app includes a major new feature: the Sleep Score. This indicator can only be accessed with Nokia Sleep, our newest sleep sensing & home automation pad. This IFTTT-capable product lets you know if your night was restorative, and combats potential sleeping disruptions such as light sleep, snoring, and irregular sleeping patterns.

Start your workout live in the Health Mate app
You can now start a live workout in Health Mate-even without an activity tracker! To start a workout, click + on Timeline and then tap "Activity". Choose your workout and then select "Start a new activity". The live workout screen appears. During the workout, you can track your data-including time, pace, and speed.
The app will save your GPS data during your session to display your path on a map. You can also see your pace and the elevation in the Performance section.

Thanks for using Health Mate! To improve your experience, we bring updates to the App Store regularly, and every update includes speed and reliability improvements.

This update adds support for Withings latest innovations:

BPM Core
A revolutionary smart blood pressure monitor that, for the first time, integrates an electrocardiogram and a digital stethoscope to detect Afib and valvular heart disease risk.

Move ECG
For the first time, an analog watch gives you the opportunity to take an ECG anytime and anywhere. With its 12-month battery life, and electrocardiogram on demand, Move ECG means you’ll never miss an AFib episode.

Learn more on http://www.withings.com

Thanks for using Health Mate! To improve your experience, we bring updates to the App Store regularly, and every update includes speed and reliability improvements.
You love our app? Please rate us 5*

With the release of Health Mate 5, we’re excited to offer a more intuitive experience than before—one that will help you focus on your daily health and learn how to improve it. In the updated app, you’ll find your data has a new home, making it easier to find your latest measurements and trends, plus relevant insights based on your data, as well as customized content.

We are pleased to welcome Thermo to the extensive family of products supported by Health Mate. Plus, two new features will allow you to enjoy Health Mate even more with friends and family.

- Family section : Health Mate allows you to track the health of your loved ones with the new family section. You'll be able to receive an alert if a family member has a high temperature and track their progress directly from the home screen.

- QR code sharing for leaderboards : the leaderboard allows you to challenge others to up their activity, and sharing invitations is now easier than ever. Show your QR code, have it scanned, and go!
